title: Haider
overview: Haider, who returns to Kashmir after learning of his father's disappearance. His father, a doctor, had been imprisoned by the army for trying to save a militant's life. Haider's mother, Ghazala, has moved into the house of his uncle, Khurram, creating tension and suspicion in Haider's mind.Haunted by his father's disappearance and the changing dynamics in his family, Haider is approached by Roohdaar, a member of a pro-separatist group. Roohdaar reveals that both he and Haider's father were imprisoned and supposed to be executed by a counterinsurgency militia formed by Khurram. While Roohdaar survived, he brings Haider his father's last wish: to seek revenge against Khurram for his betrayal.As the story unfolds, Haider's quest for revenge leads him down a path of turmoil and tragedy. He is torn between his moral values and the drive for retribution. The film culminates in a series of intense events, including confrontations, a tragic love story, and a deeper exploration of the mother-son relationship, particularly the complex emotions between Ghazala and Haider.\Haider\" is noted for its exploration of the Kashmiri conflict
original_language: the Oedipal undertones in the mother-son relationship
vote_count: and the transformation of the protagonist from a poet to a man consumed by the idea of revenge. The film's portrayal of the Kashmiri landscape and the brutality of conflict adds depth to the narrative
vote_average: deviating from the usual portrayal of picturesque tourist spots in the region.The movie has been praised for its ambitious adaptation
column8: especially by Shahid Kapoor and Tabu
column9: and its handling of complex themes like political intrigue and personal conflict"

title: sushant story 1
overview: 35 year old Vimal, a married man, falls in love with a young woman and ends up killing his wife, only to discover that it was planned by his wife all along to put him behind bars.

title: sushant story 2
overview: A young decoit, Shubham, is recruited in the gang. When a tough situation arises, Shubham kills a policeman, only to later discover that it was planned by the gang leader to eliminate the policeman and blame Shubham.

title: sushant story 3
overview: Taanshi, a young vibrant head of marketing at a company, decides to run for Prime Minister of the country. Her ambitions are met with problems from all over but she doesn't give up and ends up becoming Prime Minister of the company.

title: sushant story 4
overview: On his dead bead, Anubhav, a tech giant, decides to name his property to his employee, Mohan, who has planned this all along. Mohan faces legal problems but finally becomes the head of the tech company and owns the property.

title: sushant story 5
overview: Akshat, after loosing his father, starts seeing him in his dreams telling him to sleep calmly. But his sleep is disturbed to an extent that he ends up believing his father is alive. Later he kills himself and sleeps forever.

title: sushant story 6
overview: Ranbir sees his childhood friend after a long time Alia and falls in love. Ranbir couldn't find her address and went for a quest of finding her address and confessing his love. Finally he met an accident while searching for Alia and the saviour was Alia and they finally met got married.

title: pathan
overview: In 2019, The Indian Government revokes Article 370 of the Indian Constitution, which grants special status for Jammu and Kashmir. The news impacts a cancer-ridden Pakistani army general Qadir, who decides to exact vengeance against India and signs a contract with Jim, who leads a private terrorist organization called Outfit X.Pathaan, a RAW agent, with his senior officer Major Nandini Grewal opens a unit dubbed \Joint Operations and Covert Research\" (J.O.C.R.) to recruit former RAW agents and soldiers forced to retire due to past trauma or injury
